translations: vt.对……同情（pity 的过去式和过去分词）
vi.同情（pity 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He pitied people who were stuck in dead-end jobs.
sentences.translation: 他很同情那些工作上毫无前途的人。

sentences.sentence: Compulsive gamblers are more to be pitied than condemned.
sentences.translation: 对嗜赌成瘾者要多些同情，少些谴责。

sentences.sentence: Sesemann, you do not need to be pitied!
sentences.translation: 塞塞曼，你不需要被怜悯！
